mapper.select: SELECT bi.blog_id AS blogID, bi.title AS title, bc.content AS content, bi.release_time AS releaseTime, bi.view_count AS viewCount, bi.like_count AS likeCount, bi.author_id AS authorID, ui.nick_name AS nickName FROM blog_info bi LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON bi.author_id = ui.user_id LEFT JOIN blog_content bc ON bc.blog_id = bi.blog_id
